siteMetadata.name: HoJun Lee
siteMetadata.title: HoJun Lee | Embedded System / Firmware Engineer
siteMetadata.description: Embedde System and Firmware Engineer at Freshtech
siteMetadata.about: I'm a passionate maker who loves building things with my own hands. This passion led me to become an embedded systems engineer, where I write firmware and solder wires. Currently, I am working on a company project that utilizes ZephyrOS and nRF-based boards to develop a UWB system. In the future, I aim to enhance my skills in PCB design to become a well-rounded embedded systems developer
